text:
Jakob Oetama (27 September 1931 – 9 September 2020) was an Indonesian journalist. He was the co-founder and owner of Kompas Gramedia Group. He also created "Kompas Daily" in 1965, one of leading newspaper in Indonesia. Oetama was born in Central Java.
Oetama died on 9 September 2020 in Jakarta at the age of 88.
